title: The Darker Side of Money: Corruption and Fraud Edition
description: MarketWatch financial crime reporter Lukas I. Alpert discusses corruption and the latest developments in the world of fraud with Ted Diskant, former head of the public corruption unit for the U.S. attorney's office for the southern district of New York.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: MarketWatch financial crime reporter Lukas I. Alpert discusses corruption and the latest developments in the world of fraud with Ted Diskant, former head of the public corruption unit for the U.S. attorney's office for the southern district of New York.
